name: Fritz!Box Dark (FRITZ!OS 7.0x)
description:
A dark style for the FritzBox (FRITZ!OS: 7.01).
Successor of my previous style for FRITZ!OS 6.8x: https://userstyles.org/styles/156529/fritz-box-dark-fritz-os-6-8x
